Class ingredient

java.lang.Object
src.model.ingredient
public class ingredient extends Object
Represents an ingredient used in the inventory system. Each ingredient includes details such as its quantity levels, price, expiry time, and purchase date.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ingredient(int id, double currentQuantity, double minQuantity, double orderQuantity, double price, int expiryTime, Date purchased, String ingredientName)
    Creates a new ingredient object with all attributes.

  • Constructor Details

    • ingredient

      public ingredient(int id, double currentQuantity, double minQuantity, double orderQuantity, double price, int expiryTime, Date purchased, String ingredientName)
      Creates a new ingredient object with all attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - - The unique identifier for the ingredient
      currentQuantity - - The current quantity of the ingredient in stock
      minQuantity - - The minimum quantity threshold for the ingredient before restocking is required
      orderQuantity - - The amount to reorder when the stock falls below the minimum quantity
      price - - The price per unit of the ingredient
      expiryTime - - The number of days until the ingredient expires
      purchased - - The date the ingredient was purchased
      ingredientName - - The name of the ingredient
